titleStmt.title: R. C. Lindsay et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG8599

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p: The undersigned Citizens of Henry County would represent to yr Excellency -- that some 3 or 4 years ago a man named M Moneham and his Wife Moneham fell out & quarrelled -- that the Wife had her case heard before a Justice & said M Moneham had to give security to appear before the Circt Ct -- that Madison Ireland & W. M. Brown Went into the recognizance -- that the recognizance was forfeited -- that Sums issued & Judgt was rendered therein agt said Mad Ireland & W M Brown Exo now in the hands of Shff on Jugt for $50 -- & Costs. -- that the said M Monham and his Wife very Shortly after the recognizance was entered into made up all their difficulties & lived together & are now gone as man & wife and are now in peace -- They were both of foreign birth that the Comwealth is satisfied in this respect -- The defts in Exo say that they were ignorant as to the law of the case & ignorant of the Jugt untill the Shff the other day called on them for payt of Exo -- We believe and are satisfied the fine should be remitted -- The defts have helpless families & want all they can make to support them. We state that We are well acquainted with the above facts. Decr 3 1862.

R. C. Lindsay
Jas. G. Adams
T. J. Sparks. W. S. Messenger
Jno. Holland
Wm S. Gibson
Jno. C. Monfort P J H C C
H,, Sparks

Edwd P. Thomas --
Pettn from Henry to remit fine Comth for

Fine Remitted 16 Jan 63
J F Robinson

$50. } Recog --
M. Ireland
&
W. M. Brown
Henry Cir Ct
Issd Jany 16. 1863
